description: As taken from the HITRUST CSF, this section cover strategic risk managment items. Specifically in this cluster, the tags deal with the development and management of control of access to organizational assets.
name: ACCESS-CTL

values.description: A formal user registration and de-registration process is used to verify a user's identity and enable assignment of access rights.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Strategic Framework: 05.a User Registration and De-Registration
